mapper.select: select poa.*, mw.name, mw.category from polarity_analy poa inner join monitor_work mw on (poa.workId = mw.id) order by poa.id

SELECT country,
sum(positive)
sum(negative)
sum(neutrality)
as cnt FROM `polarity_analy` where workId = #{workId} group by country order by cnt desc
limit 0,#{offset}
SELECT workId, sum(positive) as positive, sum(negative) as negative, sum(neutrality) as neutrality FROM `polarity_analy` group by workId
